sqlMap.select: select SC_PARAM_ID, SC_ORG_ID, PARAM_KIND, PARAM_KIND_CODE, PARAM_CODE, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_DESC,LANG_FLAG from SC_PARAM where SC_ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL# and PARAM_KIND_CODE = #paramKindCode:VARCHAR# and PARAM_CODE = #paramCode:VARCHAR# and LANG_FLAG=#locale:VARCHAR#

select SC_PARAM_ID, SC_ORG_ID, PARAM_KIND, PARAM_KIND_CODE, PARAM_CODE, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_DESC,LANG_FLAG from SC_PARAM where SC_ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL# and PARAM_KIND_CODE = #paramKindCode:VARCHAR# and LANG_FLAG=#locale:VARCHAR# order by to_number(PARAM_CODE)
select distinct PARAM_KIND, PARAM_KIND_CODE from SC_PARAM where SC_ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL# and LANG_FLAG=#locale:VARCHAR# order by PARAM_KIND asc

select sp1.SC_PARAM_ID SC_PARAM_ID1, sp2.SC_PARAM_ID SC_PARAM_ID2, sp1.PARAM_KIND, sp1.PARAM_KIND_CODE, sp1.PARAM_CODE, sp1.PARAM_VALUE PARAM_VALUE_ZH, sp2.PARAM_VALUE PARAM_VALUE_EN from SC_PARAM sp1 left join SC_PARAM sp2 on sp1.PARAM_CODE = sp2.PARAM_CODE and sp1.PARAM_KIND_CODE = sp2.PARAM_KIND_CODE and sp2.LANG_FLAG = 'en_US' where sp1.LANG_FLAG = 'zh_CN' and sp1.PARAM_KIND_CODE = #kindCode:VARCHAR# order by sp1.PARAM_KIND_CODE, param_code
select SC_PARAM_ID, SC_ORG_ID, PARAM_KIND, PARAM_KIND_CODE, PARAM_CODE, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_DESC from SC_PARAM where SC_PARAM_ID = #scParamId:DECIMAL#
